title: Anyone in America Can Become a Millionaire (Hour 3)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Ken Coleman discuss:

Diversifying investments outside of a 401(k),

Dealing with an inheritance scam,

Avoiding borrowing money to start a business,

How a postal worker became a millionaire,

Deciding when it's time to sell a car.


Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6
